data.product_name: Plant Grow Light with Stand Adjustable 15-47 Inch,Four-Head Plant Growing Lamp with Red Blue LED Bulbs for House Plants,Dimmable 3 Light Modes with Auto On/Off Timing 3 9 12 Hrs

summary.topics: light, bulb, lighting, lamp, bright, led, seedling, plant, succulent, brightness, lightweight, timer, green, red, blooming, blue, electric, tripod, growth, growing, indoors, pot, color, herb, grow, adjustable, lettuce, arm, indoor, set, control, took, thriving, quality, night, hour, bought, day, purchased, winter, button, setting, automatic, mix, both, and waste

durable.review: This is the only light Ill need to keep my plant babies alive and thriving this winter. I LOVE IT!!!! Its a really good price too! You can adjust the lights depending on what you need (red blue or both) . It also has a self timer so you can set it and go about your day! The tripod is sturdy and the bulbs (4 of them) are adjustable so you can bend as you wish. allowing you to light one section or an entire room!
I like it because, it expands across all my succulent plants.
Item works well and timer feature is useful. After it is setup it will come on automatically everyday.
I am glad that it works.

easy.review: Its very easy to use and set up. Seems to be working fine.

I ordered grow lights for my plants without much experience in using them. These came in quickly and was packaged neatly. Really easy to assemble (took me about 5 mins). It has a timer with 3 different light functions. What I love about this product is its lightweight and easy to disassemble. I used the same box it came it to store it. The lights are flexible and can be moved in different directions. Only thing I wish it had was a longer cord but nothing that an extension cant do.

The assembly is extremely simple but the only thing is that, the base is a bit on the small side. If youre not careful with it, youll accidentally knock it over. The color saturation and warmth is great. LED for low electric consumption. Having the timer really is convenient.
This was soo easy to set up.! And my babies are loving it!
Quite versatile for plants of differing heights and sizes. Easy to adjust.
They were so easy to assemble- my little seedlings are popping right up  TY
This is very easy to use! 3 different timer settings and 3 different light modes (I just use the dual light mode exclusively). No issues growing plants in my basement in February here on Long Island.

quality.review: This plant grow light has exceeded my expectations!! Perfect growing light. My indoor plants have been thriving. Its so easy to install & it doesnt take up much space at all. You can adjust it to your plant sizes, tall or short, as well as adjust the necks of the lights! Your plants will love this light & you! Its a must buy!!

Perfect.  Love all 4 arms.  They cover all my plants.  Lightweight, easy to understand various heights.  Instructions say introductions. The control buttons are identified, but not really how to effectively set the 3 times, or the 3 colors. It does explain what each color accomplishes. I am still playing with it each day/night to figure it out, but I do love this product.  I live in the Pac NW, so we have heavy cloud cover from Oct-March. I also appreciate the estectic. I live in a small condo, so it doesn't take up much space.

I ordered the grow light with stand and received it within two days with standard shipping.  It is packaged well and very easy to assemble. The height is adjustable making it very convenient to use with my plants that are sitting in a shelving unit. The timer (3, 6, 12 hour)  is also very helpful.  I can leave it on in the evening, set the timer and I don't have to worry about it. I started using it and so far so good.  I intend to use this growlight more in the winter time to maintain the wide range of color of my succulents.  I wish the foot of the stand is a little wider to help prevent it from tipping.  However, long as you distribute the weight of the lights properly it's not a problem and the slim feature of the tripod stand makes it a space saver.

I love this grow light! My cherry tomato is blooming, my petunias are blooming, everything is thriving! I chose this model because I wanted the 4 light arms and I like that it is free standing and doesn't just clip onto a table. The timer works perfectly too. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
Well made and easy to build (my 11 year old built it by himself)
Order arrived early. Very satisfied w/ this purchase. Using it for my succulents when I have to live it inside.

I love my plant light!!!  It has a range of color spectrums to use and you can control the brightness.  It fits my entire table which I love and was super tall, I didnt have to use it all the way up I had plenty of room.  I really love it more than my table lights I bought earlier this year!  Id buy another set!!!  Great purchase!!!  Only thing I had an issue with is the chord is short.  Its really tight where I have it so you might have to use an extension chord!  Other than that no issues!!!  Love it!!!
My plants are thriving with this light.  The look beautiful.  This is a great product
Great product overall. Easy to assemble, easy to adjust levels (height & brightness) to various plants, love the multiple bulbs and my plants seem to love the lighting as well.

Excellent lights! Came packaged very safely. The lights are high quality with 3 light colors. Has an automatic timer which is supper convenient. I have seen a major difference on my plants are using the lights.  10/10 would recommend.
Everything I expected! Good value for the money.
The stand is super cool. My plants will do well this winter in the house.

Love, love, love. I can't believe I waited so long to get a plant light. It came really fast first if all! It's so easy to assemble. As you see in the pictures you can put quite a few plants under the lights at the same time. It's adjustable in height which I love. The colors are red or blue or red and blue simultaneously. Trust me you won't regret this purchase.

This light seemed to be of pretty good quality. It was easy for my husband to put together. The lights seemed to make my plants happy the two times that I used the light. The third time so went to turn it on, it would not turn on at all. Im not very happy with the product, but Amazon was very accommodating with the return.
look nice made well. does its job covers a good area
Good
Like
this is amazing and my cactus is thriving
Works perfect. Height adjustable. great for the price.
its work with my plants
My plants love me for it. Great for the winter months.  Great value for the product and super slim and adjustable.
Working good
love it for my flowers
Way better than fluorescent gro lights

Ok this is a real problem solver because you can focus light on the plants that need it and give the type of light needed.  Great timer features and super bendy arms make it easy to get light just where you need it.
Love the product  does  the job, great price! I will just wish that the color changing would it be something  that it could do on its own like an automatic set up!
Works great and love the lighting ambience!

I like this grow light a lot. I thought it would be cheaper to get a regular lamp, grow light bulb and timer extension cord. Dont waste your time with all that, this light is more cost effective and its awesome. Theres numerous setting for a timer, brightness and even color. I also appreciate how you can adjust the lamp height and lights themselves.
Product is great but the USB wall plug stopped working and I can't return it. All I need is a new plug.
timer could use a battery backup for settings. we had a one hour power outage during a storm and all settings were lost. besides that, its a great product. tomato sprouts in 4 days from planting.

light.review: Better than expected.  I needed an inexpensive grow light that would bring light to all the plants in my plant stand. This light does just that! What I found even more remarkable is that a few days later one of my rare plants put out a leaf (third picture). This is a plant that had not  pushed out any leaves for months since i purchased it. One of my other rare plants a Philodendron has had great growth. This plant had also barely grown in spite of getting natural light and fertilizer. I am happy with this light overall for the price. I leave it on all night and turn it off in the morning.

This is a great light . It is awesome for growing some herbs indoor or smaller plants like lettuce leaves. You can't grow a full gargen or large veggies very well indoors but since I didin't do a fall garden I was missing my fresh herbs and this has really helped.

The four lamps are easy to position and the stand is very light weight but surprisingly stable. I would have liked a longer cord, but that doesn't take away from how much I like this light.  I will be buying more, and my friends and  mother  will likely get one for themselves.

This light is pretty nice for the cost. It's tall, stable and adjustable, and my plant seems to like it. The timer doesn't seem to work very well on the 12 hour setting - I often notice that it's on at different times of the day, even though I tried to set it to come on at 7 pm. Still, not entirely displeased.
We have multiple indoor plants and have always had difficulty getting them to grow, i.e. not die. Plants have been grouped under this light and seem to be looking better.

I really like this stand but I dont think it covers a lot of space I am a novice plant grower and thought this would cover all my plants but it was only sufficient for a smaller area so I did order another light board but I love this one for my pots of uneven sizes on the ground as the arms are very easy to bend and adjust or angle to hit multiple different pots
Easy to set up, and light weight.  Does the job for a good price.
The light was kinda hard to clip on to my plant shelf, but I worked with it and finally got it clipped on and it works great.
I use this daily for my house plants. It is lite weight and flexible. They are growing well-I am happy.

I really started out loving this light.. My plants really perked up. The stand was steady  & the timer functioned well for the first week... then I started noticing the light coming  on 1/2 hour earlier every day. I had to return it but I would still recommend it. I will reorder & keep my fingers crossed.l
Noi enough light. Good for outdoor prep.
Only poor judgement on the tripod stand is weak ... need more support
Its only been a week and it already stopped working.

lighting.review: I was a little hesitant to get it, but I'm glad I did.  I like that each light setting has an automatic shut off/on so once I turn it on at a certain time, it will always turn on again at that time.  The only thing I wish was that it was taller, but that's primarily because I have my Monstera on a stand and the plant is big.  It would be perfect for any of my other plants though.  Especially glad I have it for the Fall and Winter months.  It will be beneficial I'm sure. The feet could be wider too, it can tip. And the instructions talk about green, it's the light on the buttons that turn green, the actual light for the plant is a mix between the red and blue lights.  Hopefully plant people know this.

I ordered this light for my indoor plants. The description says that there are 3 different operating modes: Green, Red and Blue light. The lights I received don't emit Green light at all. I tried all different buttons available.  Mine only switches between Red and Blue LEDs.
The light was not big enough for my plant. The seller was very good about my returning the light.

It's a good light. Can easily fall over but that's not really an issue, just something to be aware of. It's not as bright as other similar lights I've purchased in the past. I have to bring in my plants from the 3 season porch every winter and this light has really worked well for my Bird of Paradise. Foilage is staying a nice dark green and still producing new growth.
Adjustable arms and light choices. Also like timer

I own several of these grow lights. Overall, they are good. But first, the timer is not so accurate. The timer doesn't turn on and off at exactly the same times each day, instead each day it shifts a little bit. So after a while I need to reset the timer. Second, the light color is not very consistent. I always use both the red and the blue LED bulbs in all of my grow lights, but in some the red light appears stronger and in others the blue light appears stronger. For my purposes, that doesn't affect much. But it would be nicer if they had more consistent quality.

We'll see in a few weeks if the lights help the plants.  So far in two weeks or so haven't noted any changes.  The instruction sheet is fairly useless.  It mentions a green light which doesn't exist (only blue and red or both).  Not quite sure how to use all the buttons on the controller but then I haven't fiddled with it much at all.  It seems to be on "auto-pilot" coming on/off every 12 hrs so it works for me.  Stand not as flimsy as I expected from other comments.
I bought these lights for my night blooming cereus plants and they absolutely love it. They have grown a phenomenal amount since getting these lights. It's incredible

I ordered the Plant Grow Light as a temporizing measure for my Lettuce Grow stand that I have indoors.  I wanted to see if my seedlings growth problems were due to a lack of sunlight or if another issue was involved, for instance, the hydroponic water solution.  Lettuce Grow offers a lighting system that attaches to the but it is a bit costly and I wanted to make sure it would be effective before I ordered it.  The Grow Light came nicely packaged.  It was very easy to set up and to use.  The base is stable.  It did help with the seedling growth and it is helping keep my pineapple plant growing as well.

Im so disappointed with this grow light. I had to return the first one because it didnt work due to defective adaptor and controller. The merchant sent a replacement but it only worked for less than a month. Can I still return it?
I bought these to help keep my plants alive over the winter but they looks so interesting that I'll be using them for mood lighting when I take the plants  back outside.

This grow light has really helped my window sill herbs grow like crazy.  The only down side is the 24 hours timer runs a bit fast (about 23 hours 38 minutes), so each day the lights turn on 22 minutes earlier.  It took me a few months to figure this out.  I just reset it every couple week.  Minus 1-2 stars for an inaccurate 24-timer, otherwise would recommend.
Love the lighting it gives out never know there was light out there for plants love it

I purchased this in September and it is already burnout out. The timer no longer works. And only the red light is functional. and of course the bulbs are not replaceable and since the last frost has not hit yet I am not finished winterizing my plants. this light didn't even last the whole season. And there is no way to contact the seller. Or return the product or get replacement bulbs. So no it is not a value for the money. It was easy to use when I first got it. But now that its not working that is a mute .And now I see it's on sale probably because it last such a short time and you have to replace it. So don't waste your money . I will have to by a different brand to replace this one.

This is a wonderful lamp. I have another I paid much more for and this one works better. It's really adjustable and my seedlings came up in no time. It's also not hot at all and doesn't draw much power.
It wont stay programmed. It is blue or red light or both. No clear or white light.

I have two sets of these for my plants. Ive had them for a few months and just the other day I went to move one of the lights arms and the blue lights popped. So now if I want the purple light, one arm shines red. Im sad about that! But overall I enjoy the diversity of uses for these lights.

This is a great LED light for my  hybrid grows, I bought this thinking that I would not like it but I was wrong and I will definitely be buying more, maybe the manufacturer will let me test their products

lamp.review: I wanted to wait to write the review, this lamp barely increased my electric bill & I am super excited to see how vibrant my plants are getting (specifically the Lemon Tree) Lemons are doing fantastic!

bright.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I LOVVEEE IT!!!!!!!SUPERR EASY TO ASSEMBLE! VERY STURDY! Ive been using their brand for awhile and i tried this and upgrade with the one with long stand! The bottom part is very sturdy, the light is sooo bright And you can change the set up to solid blue, red or mix! I use the mix lights for my plants. It also has timer of Up to 12hrs! I love it so much!! I will buy more in the future!
Automatic options is very helpful. I was away from home for month and my plants are healthy
Had to bring in all my plants in the garage due to few days of freezing temps.  This kept my plants happy and blooming.
The lamp is amazing! I set it for 12 hours. After one month of work,  look at my picture.. I was surprised to find out my Sansevieria  has a little baby))
This light actually almost killed the plants. Took them outside to recover. In 2 days the leaves came back. This tells me all I want to know about this so-called "Grow Light".

review_types.best_review: I was a little hesitant to get it, but I'm glad I did.  I like that each light setting has an automatic shut off/on so once I turn it on at a certain time, it will always turn on again at that time.  The only thing I wish was that it was taller, but that's primarily because I have my Monstera on a stand and the plant is big.  It would be perfect for any of my other plants though.  Especially glad I have it for the Fall and Winter months.  It will be beneficial I'm sure. The feet could be wider too, it can tip. And the instructions talk about green, it's the light on the buttons that turn green, the actual light for the plant is a mix between the red and blue lights.  Hopefully plant people know this.
review_types.worst_review: This light actually almost killed the plants. Took them outside to recover. In 2 days the leaves came back. This tells me all I want to know about this so-called "Grow Light".
review_types.neutral: I ordered this light for my indoor plants. The description says that there are 3 different operating modes: Green, Red and Blue light. The lights I received don't emit Green light at all. I tried all different buttons available.  Mine only switches between Red and Blue LEDs.
